DOC.brief_summary: This pilot randomize clinical trial brief educational intervention offer primary care Latino parent promote healthy beverage consumption infant toddler . The control group receive educational intervention promote parent read child .
DOC.detailed_description: To use randomize controlled trial ( RCT ) design test efficacy primary care-based intervention promote Bright Futures recommendation consumption sugar-sweetened beverage 100 % fruit juice among Latino child age 6 month 5 year .
DOC.criteria: Parents selfidentify Latino Parents speak English Spanish Parents child age 6 month 5 year Parents participate group educational session nutrition offer obesity clinic newly refer obesity clinic Parents whose child chronic condition affect feed ( require tube feed specialize diet poor weight gain )
